articles.title: Pemex: Oil platform fire injures 3 workers in Gulf of Mexico
articles.description: MEXICO CITY (AP) — A fire on an oil platform off Mexico injured three workers Tuesday before being put out about an hour later, state oil company Petroleos Mexicanos reported.
articles.content:
MEXICO CITY (AP) A fire on an oil platform off Mexico injured three workers Tuesday before being put out about an hour later, state oil company Petroleos Mexicanos reported.
The company commonly referred to as Pemex announced via Twitter that the injured emp… [+453 chars]

articles.author: By DAVID PITT Associated Press
articles.title: GOP leaders not planning oversight of Iowa care center
articles.description: DES MOINES, Iowa (AP) — Iowa Republican legislative leaders said Tuesday they don't plan to convene an oversight committee meeting to discuss problems at an Iowa care center for people with intellectual disabilities until they know more.
articles.content:
DES MOINES, Iowa (AP) Iowa Republican legislative leaders said Tuesday they don't plan to convene an oversight committee meeting to discuss problems at an Iowa care center for people with intellectual disabilities until they know more.

articles.author: By DOUG FERGUSON AP Golf Writer
articles.title: Column: Reed digs himself a hole that will be hard to escape
articles.description: HONOLULU (AP) — Patrick Reed needed a 12-foot birdie putt to win at Kapalua and return at least some attention to his bullish brand of golf.
articles.content:
For Monahan to punish him further is effectively calling Reed a liar. He can't do that. No one can with absolute certainty. They can only think it.
The question now is how many will say it to him.
And then it becomes a matter of how long Reed can take it.

articles.title: Pistons' Blake Griffin out indefinitely after knee surgery
articles.description: DETROIT (AP) — Detroit Pistons forward Blake Griffin is out indefinitely after having surgery on his left knee.
articles.content:
DETROIT (AP) Detroit Pistons forward Blake Griffin is out indefinitely after having surgery on his left knee.
The Pistons announced Tuesday that Griffin will have an extended rehabilitation period with no timetable for his return.
The 30-year-old Griffin wa… [+713 chars]

articles.title: Human remains found in rural Missouri county
articles.description: POTOSI, Mo. (AP) — Authorities in eastern Missouri are trying to identify human remains found in a rural area.
articles.content:
POTOSI, Mo. (AP) Authorities in eastern Missouri are trying to identify human remains found in a rural area.
KTVI-TV reported Tuesday that the skeletal remains appeared to have been in a rural area of Washington County for a long time, possibly years. The re… [+380 chars]
